name: THE CYPRUS ASSOCIATION OF CANCER PATIENTS AND FRIENDS (PASYKAF)
memberOrga: -We are full members of International Union Against Cancer – UICC, the European Cancer Leagues – ECL, the European Association for Palliative Care – EAPC, European Cancer Patient Coalition, Digestive Cancers Europe and World Pancreatic Cancer Coalition.
goal:
PASYKAF was founded in 1986 by a group of cancer patients, their families and friends. It is dedicated to fighting cancer through education and awareness and improving the quality of life of cancer patients and their families through services offered and advocacy.

Free Services, Support Programs and Awareness Programs on Cancer Prevention and Early Diagnosis:
- psychosocial support including bereavement support program
-home nursing care
- physiotherapy and lymphoedema service
- transportation service
- rehabilitation center
- Gastrointestinal cancers group 'althea'
interests: Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Youth
